mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FUNDINGGOODSDETAIL FGD, USERS U WHERE FGD.USERID=U.USERID AND fgd.fundingcode=#{fundingCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FUNDINGGOODSDETAIL WHERE USERID=#{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fundingGoodsDetail fd,fundingGoods f where fd.fundingCode=f.fundingCode and fd.userId=#{userId}

SELECT f.fundingThumbnailImage,f.fundingName,f.fundingTargetRate ,fd.*,u.userprofileimage,u.userName FROM fundingGoodsDetail fd,fundinggoods f, users u where f.fundingCode=fd.fundingCode and fd.userId=u.userId and fundingGoodsDetailNumber=#{fundingGoodsDetailNumber}
select fd.* from fundingGoodsDetail fd,reward r where fd.fundingcode=r.fundingcode and r.rewardgrade=0 and r.fundingcode=#{fundingCode}
